message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $15000 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $13000?
I'm willing to make another concession, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $13500. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13500 and $12000, so I'll offer $12750. Can you consider this price?

I'm willing to consider your offer, but I think I can do better than that. I'm counteroffering at $14000 again. I know I said I wouldn't go that low, but I think this is a good compromise. What do you think?
